bool SimpleArg::load (  BitBuffer &  buf,
TileMap &  tileMap,
const TileFeatureArg *  prevArg
)  [virtual]
 

Loads the arg.

Uses 1,2,3 or 4 bytes.

Parameters:
buf The buffer to load from.
tileMap The tile map.
prevArg The adjacent argument of the previous TileFeature in the map. NULL if the previous TileFeature in the map was not of the same type as this one.
